Package databaseHelp

Class SqlCon

java.lang.Object
databaseHelp.SqlCon
public abstract class SqlCon extends Object
Provides sql based helper functions for querying the database to other methods throughout the application

    • verifyOverlap

      public static boolean verifyOverlap(String start, String end, int custId, int apptId)
      Verifies appointment doesn't overlap another appointment with the same Customer.
      Parameters:
      start - the starting date / time of the appointment.
      end - the ending date / time of the appointment.
      custId - the custId of the appointment.
      apptId - the apptId of the Appt being checked for overlap
      Returns:
      true if no overlap, otherwise return false.

    • getNumAppts

      public static int getNumAppts(Integer id, int i)
      Gets the number of appointments in specified month for a specified user
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the user
      i - the month (1-12) being queried
      Returns:
      number of appointments

      i - the month (1-12) being queried
      Returns:
      the number of appointments
